featured.text: Research shows that consuming a minimum of 25 grams of soy protein a day can lower blood cholesterol levels in people with high cholesterol problems.
Moreover, the cactus requires minimum water, and thus is not grown on traditional agricultural pasture.
It should also have the minimum amount of air bubbles.

definition.zh_def: 最小的; 最低限度的
definition.en_def: The least or smallest amount or degree.
definition.example: The minimum age to vote is 18.
